job_posting.subject: Post-Doc Position at Linz Institute of Technology (Johannes Kepler Univ. Linz, Austria) (full time, 3 years)

position_details.institution: Johannes Kepler University (JKU) Linz Institute of Technology (LIT)
focus_areas: Distributed Software Systems and Software Architectures, esp. Distributed Stream Processing Systems
Cloud Computing and Software Performance, esp. in Large, Distributed Data Systems
Real-Time, Scalable Data Processing and Querying
job_duties: Conduct Software Engineering research in the fields mentioned above
Lay the foundation for the next generation of highly scalable, data-driven software applications in collaboration with Dynatrace
Publish, present and disseminate research findings in journals, conferences and workshops
Collaborate with fellow JKU researchers and academic and industrial partners in Austria and abroad
qualifications: Strong software engineering background with experience in one or multiple of the following fields: Distributed Software Systems and Software Architectures, especially Distributed Stream Processing Systems, Real-Time, Scalable Data Processing and Querying, Cloud Computing, Software Performance, especially in Large, Distributed Data Systems, and Parallel Computing
Doctorate/Ph.D. degree in Computer Science or a related field
Experience and/or expertise in a minimum of one of the corresponding research areas
Experience in writing academic/scientific publications and presenting scientific work at international events
Experiences with Apache Spark, Apache Flink, Apache Kafka and Kubernetes are desired
Strong proficiency (C1 level) in English (both oral and written)

contact.name: Rick Rabiser
contact.title: Univ.-Prof. Mag. Dr.
contact.position: Head of Christian Doppler Lab VaSiCS, JKU-Head of JKU/Dynatrace Co-Innovation Lab, Head of Cyber-Physical Systems Lab
